page.title: 03CASTLE LEISURE CENTRE
page.content: The {Castle Leisure Park }was built in {1980.}It has many activities like pony trekking,golfing,fishing,squash/tennis and boating.It also has a bar games- room and a restaurant.There is a tent and a caravan site.It covers{365}acres of land and there are woodlands and lakes. There is also an adventure play-ground .A man named R.Dickinson thought of it and chose to put it in { Tattershall when the land had been used to extract sand and gravel.It has board-sailing,water-skiing and boating,also fishing and horse riding. Tattershall Castle is near the centre that is why it is called the Castle Leisure Centre.The gravel works is next to the Centre and when it is worked-out the land will be used to extend the Centre.There is a field where the horses are put in.It is on the main road so the cars can see it.
